label: InfectiousAgentClass
comment: Classes of agents or pathogens that transmit infectious diseases. Enumerated type.

enumerationMembers.label: Bacteria
enumerationMembers.comment: Pathogenic bacteria that cause bacterial infection.

enumerationMembers.label: MulticellularParasite
enumerationMembers.comment: Multicellular parasite that causes an infection.

enumerationMembers.label: Prion
enumerationMembers.comment: A prion is an infectious agent composed of protein in a misfolded form.

enumerationMembers.label: Protozoa
enumerationMembers.comment: Single-celled organism that causes an infection.

enumerationMembers.label: Virus
enumerationMembers.comment: Pathogenic virus that causes viral infection.
